alert.note: Alert for Burt; Dodge; Washington (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 14 at 8:15AM CST by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...AN AREA OF MODERATE SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF MONONA...HARRISON... SAUNDERS...BURT...WASHINGTON...DOUGLAS...AND DODGE COUNTIES... HAZARDS...An area of moderate snow which can rapidly reduce visibility down to a quarter of a mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 812 AM CST, an area of moderate snow was along a line extending from 6 miles east of Mapleton to 3 miles northwest of Mead and moving east at 15 MPH. THIS AREA OF SNOW WILL BE NEAR... Mapleton and Ute around 815 AM CST. Valley around 845 AM CST. Waterloo around 905 AM CST. Bennington, Elkhorn and Flanagan Lake around 915 AM CST. This includes Interstate 29 between mile markers 77 and 118. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this area of heavy snow. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. &&
